src:
Znesel se je tudi nad inventarjem
07 Nov 2019, 16:46 by Spletno uredništvo

Danes ob 7.35 so policisti obravnavali vlom v eno od trgovin v Šempetru pri Gorici, kjer se je neznanec znesel tudi nad notranjim inventarjem. Po prvih zbranih podatkih je storilec iz trgovine ukradel nekaj sto evrov blagajniškega minimuma in nekaj pločevink pijače.



Foto: STA

PRIMORSKA > Okoliščine navedenega kaznivega dejanja policisti še preiskujejo in bodo po njenem zaključku podali kazensko ovadbo na Okrožno državno tožilstvo v Novi Gorici.
Torbica je izginila
Danes ob 11.36 so policisti obravnavali nedavni tatvino ženske torbice iz ene od trgovin večjega nakupovalnega centra v Novi Gorici. Zaradi omenjenega kaznivega dejanja je bila gospodarski družbi povzročena škoda v višini 150 evrov. Na podlagi predloga za pregon s strani odgovorne osebe pravne osebe bodo policisti po zaključku preiskave navedene tatvine podali kazensko ovadbo na Okrožno državno tožilstvo v Novi Gorici.
Dve osebi sta se poškodovali
Policisti so včeraj ob 18.20 obravnavali prometno nesrečo na glavni cesti Solkan-Plave, kjer sta trčili dve osebni vozili. Dve osebi sta se laže poškodovali. Na kraju je bilo ugotovljeno, da je 34-letni voznik vozil iz naselja Plave proti Novi Gorici in v kraju Dolga njiva je njegovo vozilo v ovinku zaradi neprimerne hitrosti začelo zanašat. Na ravnem deluje trčil v nasproti vozeče osebno vozilo, s katerim se je peljal 47-letni voznik. Na kraju so poleg novogoriških policistov posredovali tudi gasilci JZ GRD Nova Gorica in reševalci NMP ZD Nova Gorica, ki so ju oskrbeli in ju zaradi suma lahke telesne poškodbe z reševalnim vozilom odpeljal na nadaljnje zdravljenje v šempetrsko bolnišnico. 34-letnemu povzročitelju prometne nesreče bo zaradi kršitve prometne zakonodaje izdan plačilni nalog.
Prometna nesreča v Kromberku
Policisti so včeraj ob 17.25 obravnavali prometno nesrečo zaradi neprilagojene hitrosti v Kromberku pri Novi Gorici. Na kraju so prometni policisti ugotovili, da je v semaforiziranem križišču v omenjenem naselju 66-letni voznik zaradi neprilagojene hitrosti trčil v drugo osebno vozilo, s katerim se je peljal 40-letni voznik. V prometni nesreči se je 40-letni udeleženec prometne nesreče lažje poškodoval. V nadaljevanju postopka je bil povzročitelju prometne nesreče odrejen tudi preizkus alkoholiziranosti in rezultat je 0,83 miligrama alkohola v litru izdihanega zraka. 66-letnega povzročitelja prometne nesreče čaka še srečanje s sodnikom, saj bo zoper njega podan obdolžilni predlog na okrajno sodišče.
Prepovedali so mu nadaljnjo vožnjo
Policisti so danes ob 10.45 na območju naselja Miren ustavili 33-letnega voznika avtomobila in mu v nadaljevanju postopka odredili hitri test zaradi suma vožnje pod vplivom prepovedanih drog. Rezultat je bil pozitiven, zato so mu policisti odredili strokovni pregled, vendar ga je voznik odločno odklonil. Vozniku je bila prepovedana nadaljnja vožnja in začasno odvzeto vozniško dovoljenje, zaradi kršitve prometne zakonodaje ga čaka še srečanje s sodnikom, saj bo zoper njega podan obdolžilni predlog na pristojno okrajno sodišče.
Iz garaže ukradli skuter
V Luciji je nekdo iz garaže ukradel skuter znamke bulevart 50, rdeče barve, registrske številke KP BC-89, vreden 800 evrov.
Vlomili v stanovanje
V Kopru so vlomili v stanovanje. Odnesli so gotovino, nakit, prenosni računalnik in Ipad.
Avto je po trčenju odbilo čez ograjo
Včeraj ob 5.16 se je v bližini mejnega prehoda Starod, na cesti proti Račicam, zgodila prometna nesreča. Policisti so na kraju ugotovili, da je 40-letni državljan Srbije vozil tovorno vozilo s priklopnikom. Zaradi neprilagojene hitrosti je priklopnik zdrsnil na nasprotno smerno vozišče v trenutku, ko je z nasprotne smeri pravilno, po svojem smernem vozišču, pripeljal 49-letni državljan Italije z avtomobilom. Po trčenju je avto odbilo čez varovalno ograjo izven vozišča, kjer je obstalo. Državljana Italije so poškodovanega odpeljali v izolsko bolnišnico, povzročitelju pa je bil izdan plačilni nalog.
Nelegalno čez mejo
Na območju koprske policijske uprave so policisti od srede do četrtka obravnavali 17 oseb, ki so nedovoljeno prestopile državno mejo med Hrvaško in Slovenijo. Policisti so obravnavali deset državljanov Sirije, pet državljanov Bangladeša ter državljana Maroka in državljana Somalije.
text:
He also rose above inventory
07 Nov 2019, 16:46 by Web Editing

At 7.35 am today, police investigated a burglary at one of the shops in Šempeter pri Gorici, where a stranger also found himself inside his inventory. According to the first information collected, the perpetrator stole a few hundred euros from the cash minimum and a few cans of liquor from the store.



Photo: STA

PRIMORSKA> Police officers are still investigating the circumstances of the said crime and will, after its completion, file a criminal complaint with the District Attorney's Office in Nova Gorica.
The purse is gone
At 11.36am today, officers were addressing a recent theft of a woman's handbag from one of the shops of a larger shopping center in Nova Gorica. The aforementioned crime resulted in a damage of $ 150 to the company. On the basis of the motion for prosecution by the responsible person of the legal entity, upon completion of the investigation of the theft, the police will file a criminal complaint with the District Attorney's Office in Nova Gorica.
Two people were injured
Yesterday at 6.20 pm police officers dealt with a car accident on the main Solkan-Plave road, where two cars collided. Two people were slightly injured. It was discovered at the scene that the 34-year-old driver was driving from Plave towards Nova Gorica, and in Dolga njiva, his vehicle started to bend in a bend due to improper speed. The plane collided with a 47-year-old passenger car opposite the car. In addition to the police officers from Nova Gorica, firefighters from the Nova Gorica Public Health Center and Nova Gorica NMP rescuers also took care of them and took them to the hospital for further treatment due to suspected light injuries by ambulance. A 34-year-old traffic accident driver will be issued a payment order for violation of traffic laws.
Traffic accident in Kromberk
Yesterday at 5:25 pm police officers dealt with a traffic accident due to unadjusted speed in Kromberk near Nova Gorica. On the spot, traffic police found that at the traffic light in the settlement, the 66-year-old driver collided with another 40-year-old passenger car due to improper speed. In a car accident, a 40-year-old participant in a car accident suffered minor injuries. In the continuation of the procedure, the cause of the accident was also ordered to have an alcohol test and the result is 0.83 milligrams of alcohol per liter of exhaled air. A 66-year-old traffic accident driver is awaiting a meeting with a judge, as he will be charged with a district court.
He was banned from driving further
Police officers stopped a 33-year-old car driver at 10.45am today in the Miren area and ordered him to continue a speed test on suspicion of driving under the influence of illicit drugs. The result was positive, so police officers ordered him to be examined, but the driver declined. The driver was forbidden to continue driving and temporarily revoked his driver's license, and due to the violation of traffic law, he is still awaiting a meeting with a judge, as he will be charged with a competent district court.
They stole a scooter from the garage
In Lucia, someone from a garage stole a Boulevard 50 scooter, red, with the registration number KP BC-89, valued at $ 800.
They broke into an apartment
In Koper, they broke into an apartment. They took cash, jewelry, a laptop and an iPad.
The car bounced over the fence after the collision
At 5.16 yesterday, a car accident happened near the Starod border crossing, on the road to Racice. Police officers found that a 40-year-old Serbian citizen was driving a truck with a trailer. Due to the unadjusted speed, the trailer slid onto the opposite carriageway at the moment when the 49-year-old Italian citizen was driven by car from the opposite direction. After the collision, the car bounced over a guardrail outside the carriageway where it existed. Italian citizens were taken to hospital in Izola and the perpetrator was issued a payment order.
Illegal across the border
In the area of the Koper Police Directorate, police officers treated from Wednesday to Thursday 17 persons who illegally crossed the state border between Croatia and Slovenia. The police officers treated ten Syrian citizens, five Bangladeshi citizens, a Moroccan citizen and a Somali citizen.
